item.name: Number of currently active IPsec Phase1 Tunnels
item.description: The number of currently active IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnels.

item.name: Incoming traffic on active IPSec Phase1 Tunnels
item.description: The total number of octets received by all currently and previously active IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnels.

item.name: Outgoing traffic on active IPSec Phase1 Tunnels
item.description: The total number of octets sent by all currently and previously active and IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnels.

item.name: Number of currently active IPsec Phase2 Tunnels
item.description: The total number of currently active IPsec Phase-2 Tunnels.

item.name: Incoming traffic on active IPSec Phase2 Tunnels
item.description: The total number of octets received by all current and previous IPsec Phase-2 Tunnels. This value is accumulated BEFORE determining whether or not the packet should be decompressed. See also cipSecGlobalInOctWraps for the number of times this counter has wrapped.

item.name: Outgoing traffic on active IPSec Phase2 Tunnels
item.description: The total number of octets sent by all current and previous IPsec Phase-2 Tunnels. This value is accumulated AFTER determining whether or not the packet should be compressed. See also cipSecGlobalOutOctWraps for the number of times this counter has wrapped.

item_prototype.name: Phase1 Peer {#SNMPVALUE} tunnel active time
item_prototype.description: The length of time the IPsec Phase-1 IKE tunnel has been active in hundredths of seconds.

item_prototype.name: Phase1 Peer {#SNMPVALUE} inbound traffic
item_prototype.description: The total number of octets received by this IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel.

item_prototype.name: Phase1 Peer {#SNMPVALUE} local peer identity
item_prototype.description: The value of the local peer identity. If the local peer type is an IP Address, then this is the IP Address used to identify the local peer. If the local peer type is a host name, then this is the host name used to identify the local peer.

item_prototype.name: Phase1 Peer {#SNMPVALUE} outbound traffic
item_prototype.description: The total number of octets sent by this IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel.

item_prototype.name: Phase1 Peer {#SNMPVALUE} remote peer identity
item_prototype.description: The value of the remote peer identity. If the remote peer type is an IP Address, then this is the IP Address used to identify the remote peer. If the remote peer type is a host name, then this is the host name used to identify the remote peer.

discovery_rule.name: IPSec Phase2 Tunnel discovery
discovery_rule.description: The IP address of the remote endpoint for the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

item_prototype.name: Phase2 Peer {#SNMPVALUE} tunnel active time
item_prototype.description: The length of time the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel has been active in hundredths of seconds.

item_prototype.name: Phase2 Peer {#SNMPVALUE} inbound traffic
item_prototype.description: The total number of octets received by this IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel. This value is accumulated BEFORE determining whether or not the packet should be decompressed. See also cipSecTunInOctWraps for the number of times this counter has wrapped.

item_prototype.name: Phase2 Peer {#SNMPVALUE} tunnel local address
item_prototype.description: The IP address of the local endpoint for the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

item_prototype.name: Phase2 Peer {#SNMPVALUE} outbound traffic
item_prototype.description: The total number of octets sent by this IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel. This value is accumulated AFTER determining whether or not the packet should be compressed. See also cipSecTunOutOctWraps for the number of times this counter has wrapped.

item_prototype.name: Phase2 Peer {#SNMPVALUE} tunnel remoteaddress
item_prototype.description: The IP address of the remote endpoint for the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.
